Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires hands-free gas dispensing at self-service gas stations in Nassau county
Summary: Allows for hands-free gas dispensing at self-service gas stations in Nassau county by equipping hold open clips on gasoline and diesel fuel dispensing nozzles.
LawCode: Add ยง396-xx, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring hands-free gas dispensing at self-service gas stations in the county of Nassau
